itunes:title: Betting $31,000 On Roulette
title: Betting $31,000 On Roulette
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary: Ilya convinced Joe to go to Vegas and do another bet of our bank account, plus we got WASTED. There's a reason the name of our pod is lightweights, cigar bars, it was mayhem. With that being said, to recoup the losses we will be posting 12 podcasts a week follow us on instagram @lightweightspod --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
Ilya convinced Joe to go to Vegas and do another bet of our bank account, plus we got WASTED. There's a reason the name of our pod is lightweights, cigar bars, it was mayhem. With that being said, to recoup the losses we will be posting 12 podcasts a week follow us on instagram @lightweightspod --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support

content:encoded:
Ilya convinced Joe to go to Vegas and do another bet of our bank account, plus we got WASTED. There's a reason the name of our pod is lightweights, cigar bars, it was mayhem. With that being said, to recoup the losses we will be posting 12 podcasts a week follow us on instagram @lightweightspod --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support
